info.name: Tenants Admin API
info.description: API collection for managing tenants, customers, warehouses, and users in the multi-tenant admin system

request.description: Check if the API server is running
Create a new tenant with associated customer, warehouse, and super admin user
Retrieve all tenants with pagination support
Retrieve a specific tenant by ID with associated customer, warehouse, and super admin details
Delete a tenant and all associated data (customer, warehouse, users, roles)
Create a default warehouse for a tenant with predefined settings
Create a default customer for a tenant with predefined settings
Create a default super admin user for a tenant with full permissions

variable.description: ID of the tenant to operate on
